tool_description: Evaluates pricing rule conditions against current market data and determines which rules should be triggered.

rule_ids.description: List of rule IDs to evaluate

market_data.description: Current market data values for evaluation

error_messages: Rule not found: one or more rule_ids do not exist in the system
Insufficient market data: market_data array lacks required values for rule evaluation
Invalid timestamp: evaluation_timestamp must be valid ISO 8601 format
Rule evaluation error: unable to process conditions for one or more rules
usage: Provide rule_ids to evaluate, current market_data array, and evaluation_timestamp. The tool checks each rule's conditions and returns activation recommendations.

triggered_rules.description: Rule IDs that should be activated

next_evaluation_time.description: Recommended time for next evaluation cycle
